name: Kuta Beach
description: Kuta is a tourist area, administratively an urban village (kelurahan), and the capital of Kuta District, Badung Regency, southern Bali, Indonesia.

name: Maldives
description: Maldives, in full Republic of Maldives, also called Maldive Islands, independent island country in the north-central Indian Ocean.

name: Sanur Beach
description: Sanur is a seaside town in the southeast of the island of Bali, in Indonesia. Its long stretch of beach offers shallow waters.

name: Paradise Island
description: Perched in the North Male’ Atoll, and just a few kilometers away from the Velana International Airport, lies one of the most beautiful luxury resorts in Maldives, Paradise Island Resort.

name: Nusa Indah Beach
description: Located in front of Lembongan Beach, Nusa Indah Bungalow features an outdoor pool and restaurant by the beach. Snorkeling, diving and surfing can be organized by the resort.

name: Source d Argent, Seychelles
description: The absolutely breathtaking scenery is the real highlight of Anse Source d’Argent. The mixture of shallow, clear water, golden sand, and imposing granite formations.

name: Dune du Pyla, France
description: The Dune of Pilat is located in the Gironde department in southwestern France. It is just at the entrance to the Arcachon Bay.

name: Shoal Bay, Antigua
description: Shoal Bay Beach is perhaps Anguilla most famous beach. Just offshore from Shoal Bay Beach is a beautiful reef with pristine snorkeling and diving conditions.

name: Cala Saona, Formentera
description: Situated on the west coast of Formentera, Cala Saona is a picture perfect beach that also boasts the most stunning sunset views on the island.

name: Glass Beach, California
description: Glass Beach is a beach adjacent to MacKerricher State Park near Fort Bragg, California, named from a time when it was abundant with sea glass created from years.

name: Starfish Beach, Panama
description: Starfish Beach is located on Isla Colon. You can either go there by bike or an ATV, or catch a colectivo bus from Bocas Town (the main town in Bocas del Toro) to Boca del Drago, which costs 2.50 USD.

name: Fakistra, Greece
description: Fakistra Beach Pelion: Fakistra is a lovely turquoise bay with soft sand and some rocky spots. This wonderful place is surrounded by huge cliffs with dense vegetation and boasts an exotic and quite wild scenery.
